First aid information?: If in eyes, hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. If swallowed, call a poison control center or doctor immediately. If a reaction is suspected, discontinue use, take off contaminated clothing, rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes, and call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
How, where, and on what crop should I us: The product is not intended for use on crops. It is an insect repellent to be applied on skin or clothing. Hold container 6 to 8 inches from skin or clothing and spray with a slow sweeping motion. Use just enough repellent to cover exposed skin and/or clothing.
How does the product have to be stored o: Store in a cool, dry place, out of reach of children. Do not puncture or incinerate the container. If empty, place in trash or offer for recycling if available. If partly filled, call your local solid waste agency for disposal instructions.
